metadata.name: Rundll32 InstallScreenSaver Execution
metadata.comment: An attacker may execute an application as a SCR File using rundll32.exe desk.cpl,InstallScreenSaver

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\rundll32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('rundll32.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('installscreensaver')))

output.summary: An attacker may execute an application as a SCR File using rundll32.exe desk.cpl,InstallScreenSaver

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate installation of a new screensaver References: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Libraries/Desk/, https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/0f229c0e42bfe7ca736a14023836d65baa941ed2/atomics/T1218.011/T1218.011.md#atomic-test-13---rundll32-with-deskcpl
